website_summaries.verdict: If you need of a standout option for a special occasion or just want something a little different, these unique placemats are a great choice.
pros: Round metallic design adds a touch of class and elegance to any table
Delicate appearance is coupled with durable functionality
cons: Open weave won't offer protection from spills

customer_reviews.title: Buying more!
customer_reviews.text: I love these so much I will buy another set! I refinished a table recently to a rich dark brown and the legs of my table have gold accents and these look high end and beautiful! They are also easy to clean and the material makes it to where they don't slide all over the table. They are not wirey feeling but a soft plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Fernfam

customer_reviews.title: Silver beauty
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these silver placemats to complete my dining room table for Christmas. They’re perfect! They look beautiful both on the table cloth or on the bare wood table. These will definitely be used again after the holidays. I’m very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amy from Miami

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: So happy with my purchase! The placemats are exactly as pictured. Very sturdy & easy to wipe down. They looked SO good on my marble dinner table, that I had to purchase again for my bar top table!
customer_reviews.author: Summer S.

customer_reviews.title: Subtle metallic sheen, easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean, durable. I have owned a set of 12 for over a year, but I needed more for a party. Was happy to find them here. Great item for the price. The top does have a nice metallic sheen. Upon delivery you will find they are very well zip-tied in bunches.... a little too well. Take great care when you remove the zip ties.
customer_reviews.author: True Blue Texan

customer_reviews.title: Love these placement
customer_reviews.text: Im very happy, the placemats are beautiful and of sturdy quaility! I have been looking for these silver placemats for the last two years (and I could only find the gold set) as I had damage my silver set by spraying a cleaning product on them. The picture of my dinning room table has the silver set. The close up picture has the gold set.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: when you touch it the silver shinny part stay on your fingers
customer_reviews.text: when you touch it the silver shinny part stay on your fingers return it as it was a quite expensive items
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie FAYOLLE

customer_reviews.title: LOOKING FOR THIS FOR A LONG TIME!
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching for this gold and silver placemats for some time, since I want to set my table with this colors. Very versatile and good quality too! Shipping was very fast and arrived in excellent condition. I got one set of each color and plan to use them together with coordinating napkins and napkin holdersfor an elegant look.
customer_reviews.author: Z. Rezk

customer_reviews.title: Not Happy
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in a very big box with no padding. As a result placemats were bent and crushed and they cannot be flattened back into shape. If you do decide to get these please be advised that when you wipe them off you may wipe off the silver finish. They also stain easily.
customer_reviews.author: bethyb

customer_reviews.title: The Paint is Coming Off
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to go with my modern apartment. I think they are very cute but unfortunately the paint is starting to come off. I don't think I'll buy these again but they look exactly like the photos.
customer_reviews.author: rsa1111

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, good quality
customer_reviews.text: These are great!! Much better than expected. No gold color rubbed off on me at all - not sure what others are talking about. They feel durable and sturdy. They're really attractive. I spilled a coffee on them immediately and it was easy to clean up, but I imagine food might be more difficult bc of all the little holes. They're thinner than i expected.
customer_reviews.author: Kabak Epperson

customer_reviews.title: Level Up your table setting game
customer_reviews.text: Bought these on short notice for thanksgiving. They are really nice and we got a lot of compliments on them. They add a nice modern sophistication to your table setting. They are a flexible vinyl material so you can roll them up and they are very easy to wipe clean. Gold paint doesn’t fade or flake. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: 8675 3oh9999

customer_reviews.title: beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty and kid friendly, my son is 8 and spills stuff on the table very often and they wash easily with a wet cloth. I am a huge fan of gold and these compliment my dinning room perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not good for intended use...but you can be creative with them
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased these for what they are intended to be used for which are dinner table placemats. That wasn't going to work out because there are holes in the mats and I wasn't trying to ruin my tablecloth. However, they are really pretty with a nice design, so instead of using them for dinner mats, I'm using them for decorative mats.
customer_reviews.author: Lena

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: I have been seeing this type of placemat in some high end stores and was so excited to find these on Amazon. I use these placemats with purple goblets, purple plates and silver flatware and I've gotten so many compliments. I definitely would recommend these and they add a dimension of light to the table for dinner gatherings. Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: MC in San Dieg

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful at first
customer_reviews.text: These placemats were so beautiful out of the box, however I don't think I thought about the practicality of having placemats with so many little holes in them. They're a bit of a pain to clean, and some of the gold paint is coming off in areas where food sat for a little too long. I feel like I should have expected that though. Still a beautiful product, just maybe not for the wear and tear I put them through.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Modern and oversized
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, oversized and excellent quality. These placemats are just larger than a charger plate and made extremely well -looks to be laser cut as the design is open and all edges are smooth and well cut. Material is not at all flimsy and lays flat. Came packaged very securely -I had to use my Cutco scissors to clip the tightly secured plastic holders. Great price. Outstanding product.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Made for a cute summer table. They are huge so make sure you’ve got the space, they wouldn’t fit on my normal six seat dinner table lol. Just take a look at the dimensions and the table you intend to use them on
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Still the price here isn’t bad. Personally I just don’t prefer these after seeing ...
customer_reviews.text: For me they’re just ok. Not gonna use them. Now that I’ve ordered mine, I’m starting to see them for half the price. Still the price here isn’t bad. Personally I just don’t prefer these after seeing them in person.
customer_reviews.author: Treva

customer_reviews.title: NOT COPPER COLOR
customer_reviews.text: WAIST OF MONEY... I am so upset! I have the gold & silvers ones and all I needed to complete my table was the copper. I was so excited when they offered them, and ordered right away, BUT only to be disappointing because they are so NOT copper! They are straight up a bright metallic tangerine orange color. I could just cry. WAIST OF MONEY...
customer_reviews.author: Leenette B.

customer_reviews.title: great silver color, nice size
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for placemats for the table for Christmas since I decorated in blue, white and silver. These were stunning! They are absolutely beautiful, durable and easy to clean. Great quality!!!!!! Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: ts

customer_reviews.title: I love these!
customer_reviews.text: These are so perfect. At first I was skeptical as they have holes in them, but the holes are so small they still keep everything off the table. My 2- and 3-year-old niece and nephew came over for spaghetti recently, and my table was clean! The place mats were easy to clean as well - just a damp paper towel got all the mess off! And, they are so pretty! We don't move them - they stay on their place on the table and are cleaned when needed, and there are no complaints here!
customer_reviews.author: Abbie

customer_reviews.title: These are beautiful. Used these while staging our home to sell
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful. Used these while staging our home to sell. Accepted an offer after one showing, so they did their part!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle & Julie

customer_reviews.title: Unique!
customer_reviews.text: I think these are very well made & really unique under a plate instead of a simple square, round or rectangle place mat. Was very happy to have found these on Amazon as every other site was sold out! Amazon to the rescue again!
customer_reviews.author: CMMacy

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and good for round tables
customer_reviews.text: Very modern and nice color. They seem very thick and easy to wipe. The only downside is crumbs can fall easily through the holes but not too big of a deal to lift and wipe.
customer_reviews.author: T Warren

customer_reviews.title: Yeah, they’re just plastic
customer_reviews.text: The placemats look much better in the photos online than in reality. They are sturdy though and will last through several uses.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Corsi

customer_reviews.title: Buy!
customer_reviews.text: These are great. True to color. I bought to use on my bedside table. It stops it from marking and keeps things from sliding. Works fantastic and is a great accent colour for my room
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for price
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased some from a different store but needed an additional 4.. found these and they match to a T! The gold isn’t overwhelming or cheap looking.. more of a champagne gold. The mats are large enough to see even with a charger placed on top, easy to swipe clean and are thick without being stiff. Great quality and are the perfect addition to my table setting!
customer_reviews.author: SheilaE

customer_reviews.title: I
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Poinsettia Placemats in colors as pictured but received solid red Poinsettia Placemats instead. I just wish you would send what I order. I will keep what I received and enjoy them!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Janice R. Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but non-slip
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice as a set on my dark table despite parts where the gold color is scratched off and faded; however, they slip when I’d put the fork and knife on the plate so that is primarily why I’m returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Argiro

customer_reviews.title: Silver Spots
customer_reviews.text: I really like the placement mats. However the gold ones had spots of silver spots on them. Since I’ll have plates on top of them I don’t mind. However, if your just planning to have the placement mats on the table by themselves I advise you not to get the gold ones if that will bother you because it’s definitely noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: I bought the silver blossom but I gave had the maple leaf for several years, so I knew it would be durable. It looks great and works well. Not so effective if you are a chronic spiller as it is riddled with holes.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsee

customer_reviews.title: They are beautiful and elegant.
customer_reviews.text: I just became a 66 y/o miminlist. I downsized from a full dining set to a 2 chair round dinette set. The placemats are beautiful on the set.
customer_reviews.author: Vonnie53

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty, not as colorful as in picture, but great quality and everyone liked them , pretty decor, can use even if it's not Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Kim foster MARTIN

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen Bling
customer_reviews.text: If your into bling this product is for you. I ordered the cooper color and looks great on a glass dining table. I haven't had them time to predict sturdiness or easy to clean yet.
customer_reviews.author: David lovato

customer_reviews.title: Big hit with shower guests.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these placemats to go under centerpieces for a bridal shower and they were a huge hit. They looked beautiful, durable vinyl so they'll last, and the pattern is even better in person. Very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: fehrdeal

customer_reviews.title: Buy them!
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars, especially for the price. Regularly get compliments! Feel a little cheap if you actallly pick them up, but by just looking they’re fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Mark T. Keiser

customer_reviews.title: Fancy with great durability
customer_reviews.text: Loved the durability as well as the look. Quite thick material and does not slide on my glass table. Although the size is a little larger than what my table can fit, I decide to keep it because of the great product quality.
customer_reviews.author: swapnil

customer_reviews.title: Quality and class.
customer_reviews.text: The place-mats can be used for formal or informal decor. I use them on my large granite island and clean them accordingly. Great quality and they look so nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: They are absolutely beautiful and I’m in love with this product! I didn’t expect them to look this great. It adds a fancy touch to my table
customer_reviews.author: Ky

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & Affordable
customer_reviews.text: Love these tablemats. They are stylish, affordable, easy to clean and just overall lovely
customer_reviews.author: Selena

customer_reviews.title: Gold placemat...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the gold blossom placement and love them so far. I'm impressed that they feel sturdy and yet are easy to wash clean. Glad I ordered them - they look even better in person.
customer_reviews.author: L McLean

customer_reviews.title: Very nice placemat
customer_reviews.text: These were gorgeous, very sturdy product not flimsy at all. I gave it 4 stars because the packaging could have been better, it was not wrapped in anything and came underneath some other stuff I had ordered. Good thing it wasn't damaged.
customer_reviews.author: J.V.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: These look beautiful and hold up well. They’re nice and thick and easy to clean. They’re quite large, as well. One word of caution: they had several tiny zip ties holding them together, which were hard to remove without cutting/scratching the placemats.
customer_reviews.author: J Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was hoping for!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, love the shiny metallic finish! I actually bought these to put on my dark nightstands. Looks cute and useful!
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Zellon

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: So impressed with the product. I am going to order for more as I do have seating for six. Very delicate very pretty very practical
customer_reviews.author: Alison N

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty!
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and color! The gold looks great on our dark wood table. Only downside is crumbs get between the holes in the pattern
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty and functional.
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty and functional. Needed to add more to my other set. So pleased I found these on Amazon. Festive yet great for year round use.
customer_reviews.author: Ariana

customer_reviews.title: Good look
customer_reviews.text: I love the design and quality! It’s hard to clean so don’t use it with kids
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adds elegance!
customer_reviews.text: I love these placemats! They add elegance to rustic. Also, good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Yay!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful placemats; love these! They're a great addition to my table, and really versatile. I layer them with other mats to change up the look every now and then. Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: Great placemat! Great quality for the price and easy ...
customer_reviews.text: Great placemat! Great quality for the price and easy to clean off! The gold has a nice shine and finish to it.I like that you can see the tablecloth through the small holes which adds more depth to the tablescape.
customer_reviews.author: RayRay

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful and modern looking. Mine barely get used as we rarely sit at the dining table, however they do add an elegant touch to my glass round table.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Looks beautiful on dark wood table, seem a little thin but I don't think they'll break or anything
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty, and easy to wipe off with a damp cloth or napkin. ... I thought they might be to dressy / shiny for everyday use; but they’re not! - Can “dress” up or down! 😉
customer_reviews.author: D. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Looks very sophisticated and beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: Looks very sophisticated and beautiful. This product always receives compliments from my guests. Not sure yet about the quality (little time passed since I am using those) - let's see, I hope it will be the same amazing as their look.
customer_reviews.author: Irina Matijosaitiene

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: Happy with my purchase! They look great on my table.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Walters

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: The product was as expected. They aren’t a fabric but more of wipeable material. They are in my dining room looking all fancy.
customer_reviews.author: DrM@

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Iv'e had mine for a few years and they look really good and are easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: MICHELE TRACY

customer_reviews.title: Perfect if placemats weren’t folded for shipping
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Very pretty. My only complaint is they were folded in half in the box and now they have a permanent crease down the middle of each placemat. I ordered two sets of 4 and they were all bent. I have laid books and heavy items on them all day but it has done nothing for the Kris through the center of each placemat. I would return but need them for Thanksgiving.
customer_reviews.author: Christi Z.

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: These are really cute and a great value for the money. Easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am so upset!
customer_reviews.text: I bought silver sets of placemats but i received golden ones. 🤔🤷🏻‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Lily Chim

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: This are so cute and great quality. Happy I made the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: PRIMEpro

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but defective
customer_reviews.text: Poorly packaged items resulted in permanent crease. We tried everything to flatten out but nothing works. Unfortunately we threw away the original packaging before realizing how bad the crease is. Placemats are beautiful but they look horrible with the crease.
customer_reviews.author: George P

customer_reviews.title: Cute placemats
customer_reviews.text: Durable, easy to hand wash when it’s dirty and air dry
customer_reviews.author: ceceusmc

customer_reviews.title: Again, what you see is what you get
customer_reviews.text: I like when I see something on Amazon and when I get it looks exactly like the picture (or better). Again, with these placemats what you see is what you get. Vinyl painted in gold. Not shiny glittery, but gold, just like the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Maurizio B.

customer_reviews.title: Classy
customer_reviews.text: Very classy look. Easy to clean. Reversible black color to change the look. Nice
customer_reviews.author: Sal Lo

customer_reviews.title: Versatile placemats
customer_reviews.text: These placemats are very versatile, you can dress them up or down. The are a thin but sturdy rubber material of some sort. I got several compliments on them at a dinner party I hosted.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Gold Placemats
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I absolutely love the gold placements I added to my dining room table. Durable, Stylish, Chic, Easy To Clean & Affordable! Thank you Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Giovanni Nikole

customer_reviews.title: Nice mats!
customer_reviews.text: Love these placemats! They bring a nice touch to my dinning room table.
customer_reviews.author: teresa

customer_reviews.title: Table doillies
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for the price. Walmart has the same ones but these are thicker.
customer_reviews.author: ranulfo zavala

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: I really like these placemats. I use them under my chargers on the dining room table and they really help dress up my table setting without being too formal. They seem sturdy and good quality too so I should be able to keep using them for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Marileen

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, used for a little color on my nightstands!
customer_reviews.author: Jaimy Zorotovic

customer_reviews.title: nice size and quality
customer_reviews.text: bought the item to use for a guest dinner. we ended up returning them because we went with a different color scheme. nice large size, could still have used a charger under the plates.
customer_reviews.author: C. Donnell

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully designed placemats!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful placemats. Fresh, and dress a dining table well. Am very pleased with the quality. Clean up easily!
customer_reviews.author: coffee aficionado

customer_reviews.title: Better than I thought :)
customer_reviews.text: These make my table pop :) super cute and chic
customer_reviews.author: Carl Eutsler

customer_reviews.title: Paint start peeling off
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice but its too thin and it doesnt even last long. The paint starting peeling off after 1 week and when i put hot product on it it got burned . It is easy to cleaned but if you keep washing it gets more thinner.
customer_reviews.author: RGianni

customer_reviews.title: Pretty!
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty at my island! Nice to pull out for dinner parties with friends. They also rinse off well. Don't fold them when you store, however. They crease.
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie Malpass

customer_reviews.title: Looks just perfect with my decor
customer_reviews.text: It is golden and not too blingy golden. Perfect !
customer_reviews.author: Qwerty

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: These are better than I expected . They look gorgeous on my table.
customer_reviews.author: Toya G

customer_reviews.title: The color is gorgeous and feels elegantly
customer_reviews.text: Much more beautiful than expected love love love them ,more beautiful I. Person
customer_reviews.author: Deucie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome placemats!
customer_reviews.text: The placemats are absolutely beautiful! I bought them for my Dad’s new home. They were a great addition to the decor!
customer_reviews.author: Ginny01

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and worth the money!!
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful and so easy to clean! They look great on our dinner table. Very unique and we are very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Erica M Crabtree

customer_reviews.title: Mom's doilies!
customer_reviews.text: My mom loved them as they gave the table a fresh uncluttered look but also protected the table from heat or scratches.
customer_reviews.author: Carlene Wiegel

customer_reviews.title: Great presentation
customer_reviews.text: I love how they look in my house they are great quality very classy
customer_reviews.author: daniela

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I use them on end tables, with decor on them (flowers, candles, etc) They're perfect!
customer_reviews.author: B. Decker

customer_reviews.title: Classy and Cute
customer_reviews.text: Surprised at how much I like these. Gold color has nice shine and mats are durable.
customer_reviews.author: Kiss My Bulldog

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as the photo show
customer_reviews.text: This was just what I needed for my new round marble dining table! Blends in perfectly with my white and gold theme.
customer_reviews.author: S. D.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Came in looking just like picture! Love them, good size as well.
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper Elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly good and very pretty, but Walmart sells the same exact product for 1.97 each. A far better deal for a set of four.
customer_reviews.author: Laken

customer_reviews.title: Love these. Perfect for my table.
customer_reviews.text: Adds holiday cheer and they are perfect for my table.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Leon, Human Resource Consultant

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful place mats!!
customer_reviews.text: I was so nervous to order these for my best friend’s bridal shower but they were PERFECT!! When I received them I was so happy about the gold color and the quality. They look very expensive and I’m definitely keeping them as my place mats at home!
customer_reviews.author: Olivia S.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty placemats!!
customer_reviews.text: I get a lot of compliments when I use these placemats.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Butler

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice light metallic gold color, perfect for holiday decorating and simple enough for every day.
customer_reviews.author: LynnMcG

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with these.. They are nice and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: God is great!

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: These mats are perfect for my table. I wasn't expecting it to look amazing, but for what I needed it for, it's just perfect. (Excuse the mess on my table)
customer_reviews.author: Tashna

customer_reviews.title: Better than Walmart's!
customer_reviews.text: I love them so much ... my theme is silver and they go so well with all my decor ... if u are looking to add silver to ur table this is it!!! They are beautiful !
customer_reviews.author: TKimp

customer_reviews.title: Great price and look perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic substitute, even better than, the Chillewich brand place mats which are very similar.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: Bought multiple sets for Thanksgiving. They’re a great, elegant-looking alternative to a traditional placemat. Easy to wipe clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: They made my Christmas table very elegant. I love them :)
customer_reviews.author: Giuli

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. Such fun to have something that is not perfectly shaped or symmetrical - plus, they look fabulous!
customer_reviews.author: Karen P Higgins

product_meta.title: Benson Mills Pressed Vinyl Placemat (Set of 4), 15.5", Bloom-Gold, 4 Count
product_meta.description: Color:Bloom-goldThis beautiful pressed vinyl placemats will be perfect for your dinning table. Very unique and creative pattern. It is ideal for everyday use and also for decoration. This place mat with durable vinyl material will be a great choice for you. Additional collection is available under Benson Mills.
feature_bullets: Make sure to search Benson Mills to view our entire catalog for Christmas, Harvest, Spring, Summer and Everyday excellent table linens, fulfilled by Amazon.com, Please leave us a review and let us know what you think
SIMPLY ELEGANT! These luxurious pressed vinyl placemats are a MUST HAVE!
Very easy to clean. Wipe clean with a damp cloth.
